API Reference
=============

.. TODO: Provide a brief overview of the project's API structure.

This section provides detailed documentation for the DeepRetro Python API, generated automatically from docstrings.

   :caption: Modules:

   api_module

.. Add more .rst files here for each main module/package in src/
   For example, if you have src/core.py, create core_module.rst and add it.
   If you have a package src/subpackage/, create subpackage.rst with an automodule directive for it.
